spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is maintained, but window placement in Bed-2 and Bed-4 deviates from the plan. Entrance foyer area shows slight wall alignment drifting compared to the kitchen boundary.

structural_fidelity.notes: While all primary rooms are present, door embeddings are inconsistent; some doors appear as simple openings while others are modeled as thick slabs. The balcony/deck railing geometry in the top-right corner is simplified and loses the specific angled notch shown in the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Dining table scale is slightly oversized, crowding the circulation path. Bed orientations match the plan correctly. Rug placement in the living area is accurate to the 2D reference.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent lighting and clean geometry. The orthographic projection is well-executed with professional-grade material rendering. Visual clarity of the internal separators is high.

detected_errors.description: Window in Bed-2 is shifted toward the corner compared to the central placement in the original floor plan.
Dining area furniture group is disproportionately large, reducing the visible 'hallway' space shown in the 2D layout.
Wall artifacts and thickness inconsistencies at the intersection of the Foyer and the Kitchen wall.
Entrance door orientation is ambiguous; the 3D model shows an open void rather than the specific swing direction indicated in the schematic.
